title: Average ticket price Miami Heat ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average ticket price in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2009/10, gradually increasing from 2009/10 to 2013/14, and finally roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010/11 and 2011/12.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 78.3 was reported at Year 2013/14, and 2014/15
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 56.55 was reported at Year 2006/07
